changelog.name: ShadowBox

version.releaseNotes: This release refines theme options initialization and refines CSS.
version.change: CSS: Added current-page-item styling to distinguish links to other pages.
version.fix: Theme Options: limited model css so that it didn't change styles of admin panel
version.change: CSS: added padding to bottom of sidebars.
Theme Options: refactored how theme options are intialized and reverted so theme model is more accurate and doesn't need update button after initial selection and after reverting

version.releaseNotes: This release refines and updates css to ensure all blog templates display correctly.
version.change: Theme Options: Added message to users explaining need to update theme options UI to set up default options.
Theme Options: Changed the name of the theme options page to include theme name.
version.new: CSS: defined widecolumn and narrowcolumn styles to ensure readability of pages that do not have custom template files.
version.change: Config: added theme name and url to config-sample.php.
Custom variation: added option to set translucent blog title color on transluence themes.
CSS: refined CSS for post headers and links.
Author pages: set limit to number of posts displayed in custom author pages and added navigation links to other pages of posts.

version.releaseNotes: This release adds many more theme options including a 2nd right sidebar, opacity levels and header width. The theme options model has been improved to be more accurate. Finally, theme variations are more extensible so new variations can be added without changing function.php.
version.change: Theme Options UI: reorganized display of theme options so UI is more accurate and easier to use and extend.
Theme Options: refactored set_primary_options so that options defined in the theme config are processed.
Theme Variations: refactored set_variation_options so that variations options are included from files in a variations directory
Theme Options: refactored widget bar options so all widget areas (sidebars, top and bottom bars) and header have same options for color and opacity
Options: renamed many options to that naming convention is more consistent and extensible.
Config: added config options for specifying what theme options to include in theme option UI and what variations to enable.
version.new: Theme Options: added options for setting opacity of left, right, top and bottom bars as well as header.
Theme Options: added a revert button to revert theme options to defaults
Widgets: added area for 2nd right sidebar

version.releaseNotes: This release adds more RSS links to various pages of theme, custom author pages, new options for header height and blog title text position. Also added configuration file for saving custom header image files and header left meta options.
version.change: Display: changed how archive titles are displayed.
Options: changed sidebar title color derivative option to be determined by sidebar color.
version.new: Configuration: added a config option for default header image.
version.change: Options: changed header text option to include position of the blog title and description within the header block or hide (top, middlebury, bottom, hide).
version.new: Options: added an primary option for setting the height of the header block.
Configuration: added a config-sample file that can be saved as config.php and used by blog admins to set default theme options.
Documentation: added docs directory with changelog files
Aggregation: added custom author pages and links to these from post attribution line
RSS: added links to category and tag RSS feeds in the archive view
version.change: Comments: changed the color of text in comments field from gray to black for better usability.

version.releaseNotes: First release of ShadowBox WordPress Theme

changelog.about: ShadowBox is a customizable, flexible and extensible theme for WordPress
